full_summary:
### Rent an Outdoor Firing Range Facility

#### Tender Details
* **Reference Number**: PW-23-01020440
* **Tender Closing Date**: Monday, 24 January 2023 @ 14:00:00
* **Statement of Capabilities**: Suppliers who consider themselves fully qualified and available to provide the services described in the ACAN may submit a statement of capabilities in writing to [lynn.kalp@cbsa-asfc.gc.ca](mailto:lynn.kalp@cbsa-asfc.gc.ca) by the closing date and time of this notice.

#### Background and Objectives
An Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN) is a public notice indicating the intention to award a contract to a pre-identified supplier for goods, services, or construction. The Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA) requires the rental services of an outdoor firing range facility in Cornwall, Ontario.

The facility must provide a firearms training range for approximately 20 days per year. The contractor must also provide safety procedures and ensure compliance with the prescribed standard policies of the CBSA.

#### Tasks and Deliverables
* Provide a firearms range for approximately 20 days per year.
* Ensure the provision of safety procedures.

#### Period of the Proposed Contract
The contract period is from April 1, 2023 to March 31, 2024, with the option to extend the contract by four (4) additional one-year periods.

#### Supplier Information
Suppliers who are interested in providing the services described in the ACAN may submit a statement of capabilities in writing to [lynn.kalp@cbsa-asfc.gc.ca](mailto:lynn.kalp@cbsa-asfc.gc.ca) before the closing date and time of this notice.
